summary: Sistem Tracking SHQ AQL - Program & Timeline Management with KPI tracking feature
architectural_notes: KPI form structure: Nama KPI, Program Terkait (dropdown), Tim/PIC (dropdown), Nilai Target (number), Nilai Realisasi (number), Periode (dropdown), Status (dropdown)
Frontend-backend data synchronization required for KPI records
Type validation needed: Nilai Target and Nilai Realisasi must be numbers not strings
known_issues: Invalid record error when saving KPI form - mismatch between frontend and backend data structures
KPI form submit fails silently without showing which field causes the error
Possible serialization issue with dropdown values (Program Terkait, Tim/PIC, Periode, Status)

existing_features.title: Fix the 'invalid record' error that occurs when clicking 'Simpan' (Save) button in the KPI form by ensuring the frontend data structure matches the backend KPI type definition exactly
Ensure Nilai Target (target value) field in KPI form is properly typed and serialized as a number (Nat) when submitting to backend, not as a string
Ensure Nilai Realisasi (realization value) field in KPI form is properly typed and serialized as a number (Nat) when submitting to backend, not as a string
Verify Program Terkait (Related Program) dropdown correctly maps the selected program to the backend-expected format (program ID or reference)
Verify Tim/PIC (Team/Person in Charge) dropdown correctly maps the selected team member to the backend-expected format (Principal ID or team member ID)
Add comprehensive error logging in KPI form submission to capture and display specific field validation errors from the backend response
